definitions.text: the act of hopping; jumping upward or forward (especially on one foot)
twining perennials having cordate leaves and flowers arranged in conelike spikes; the dried flowers of this plant are used in brewing to add the characteristic bitter taste to beer
an informal dance where popular music is played
move quickly from one place to another
travel by means of an aircraft, bus, etc.
examples: She hopped a train to Chicago
He hopped rides all over the country

definitions.text: traverse as if by a short airplane trip
make a jump forward or upward
